org.youscope.addon.focussearch

Interface FocusSearchResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, java.rmi.Remote, Resource

    public interface FocusSearchResource
extends Resource
    A focus search algorithm addon is a class defining an algorithm to autofocus based on a given focus score.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double runAutofocus(FocusSearchOracle oracle)
      Runs the focus score algorithm using the given oracle to determine the focus scores.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.resource.Resource

        getTypeIdentifier, initialize, isInitialized, uninitialize

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.Component

        addMessageListener, getName, getPositionInformation, getUUID, removeMessageListener, setName

    • Method Detail

      • runAutofocus

        double runAutofocus(FocusSearchOracle oracle)
             throws ResourceException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
        Runs the focus score algorithm using the given oracle to determine the focus scores.
        Parameters:
        oracle - An oracle to determine the focus score at a given (relative) focal plane.
        Returns:
        The focus position of the best focal plane.
        Throws:
        ResourceException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
